title: [Medicine] Scientists traced the evolution of the coronavirus from the Wuhan variant to Omicron and found that most of the genomic mutations of SARS-CoV-2 occur due to processes in the guts and lungs. It is in these organs that the virus learns to evade the blocking microRNA molecules.
[Health] A Stroke Stole Her Ability to Speak at 30. A.I. Is Helping to Restore It Years Later.
